name: Praying Mantis Simulator 3D
description:
In this inesct simulator you can expire adventures from the perspective of a praying mantis. This 3D survival game and animal simulator will set you into a realistic simulation of the insect world. Establish your own virtual mantis colony. Search for food resources in order to feed your larvas. Exploring a huge detailed natural habitat filled with other insects that will attack.

Fights against enemy insects like huge Scorpions, Spiders, Ticks, Worms, Ants or other Praying Mantis

-3d animal simulator and a survival game **
-very realistic insect behaviour *
-open world game with a huge map - explore a detailed, huge 3d natural insect terrain
-> forest environment, different plants, realistic textures, water
-Insect Simulator - other insects as foodsource like spider, praying mantis worms, fly, ants etc. **
-attack and fight against enemy insects **
- collect food in the form of fruit or sugar to feed the larvas to get new mantises **
-high-quality animation of the 3D insects, spider and other insects **
-first person, easy touch control **
-explore underground caves wihch are occuped by large scoprions **
publishers: H. K. Solution Gesellschaft mit beschraenkter Haftung
